Text:
Excellent image and sound quality. Indistinguishable from the original BluRay. 

There are Dutch subtitles available, synced to this release, at Ondertitel.com: 
http://ondertitel.com/ondertitels/info/King-Kong-%282005%29/55012.html

Much better image and sound quality than the 5GB 1080p KiNGDOM release.
